data.lyric:
[ti:Wishing Well (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Wishing Well (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:00.30]Lyrics by：Darrel Jackson/Jarad Higgins/Lukasz Sebastian Gottwald
[00:00.60]Composed by：Darrel Jackson/Jarad Higgins/Lukasz Sebastian Gottwald
[00:00.90]Mm-mm mm-mm-mm-mm mm-mm-mm uh
[00:06.05]I can't breathe
[00:07.33]Chopsquad
[00:07.48]I can't breathe 999
[00:13.87]Waiting for the exhale
[00:18.79]I toss my pain with my wishes in a wishing well
[00:25.12]I can't breathe I'm waiting for the exhale
[00:28.62]Toss my pain with my wishes in a wishing well
[00:31.38]Still no luck but oh well
[00:34.87]I still try even though I know I'm gon' fail
[00:38.56]Stress on my shoulders like a anvil
[00:41.78]Perky got me itching like a anthill
[00:44.64]D**gs killing me softly Lauryn Hill
[00:47.81]Sometimes I don't know how to feel
[00:51.06]Ring-ring phone call from depression
[00:54.02]You used my past and my memories as a weapon
[00:57.36]On the other line I talk to addiction huh
[01:01.00]Speaking of the devil all the d**gs I miss them
[01:04.21]This can't be real is it fiction
[01:07.34]Somethin' feels broke need to fix it
[01:10.26]I cry out for help do they listen
[01:13.81]I'ma be alone until it's finished
[01:17.03]This is the part where I tell you I'm fine but I'm lying
[01:20.58]I just don't want you to worry
[01:23.35]This is the part where I take all my feelings and hide 'em
[01:27.23]'Cause I don't want nobody to hurt me
[01:29.40]I can't breathe I'm waiting for the exhale
[01:32.55]Toss my pain with my wishes in a wishing well
[01:35.41]Still no luck but oh well
[01:38.89]I still try even though I know I'm gon' fail
[01:42.50]It's stress on my shoulders like a anvil
[01:45.91]Perky got me itching like a anthill
[01:48.66]D**gs killing me softly Lauryn Hill
[01:51.84]Sometimes I don't know how to feel
[01:54.92]Sometimes I don't know how to feel
[01:58.22]Let's be for real
[01:59.77]If it wasn't for the pills I wouldn't be here
[02:02.90]But if I keep taking these pills I won't be here yeah
[02:07.02]I just told y'all my secret yeah
[02:10.43]It's tearing me to pieces
[02:13.62]I really think I need them
[02:17.54]I stopped taking the d**gs and now the d**gs take me
[02:20.97]This is the part where I tell you I'm fine but I'm lying
[02:24.55]I just don't want you to worry
[02:27.34]This is the part where I take all my feelings and hide 'em
[02:31.15]'Cause I don't want nobody to hurt me
[02:33.45]I can't breathe I'm waiting for the exhale
[02:36.56]Toss my pain with my wishes in a wishing well
[02:39.38]Still no luck but oh well
[02:42.74]I still try even though I know I'm gon' fail
[02:46.47]It's stress on my shoulders like a anvil
[02:49.77]Perky got me itching like a anthill
[02:52.64]D**gs killing me softly Lauryn Hill
[02:55.81]Sometimes I don't know how to feel
data.trans:
[ti:Wishing Well (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.30]//
[00:00.60]//
[00:00.90]//
[00:06.05]我无法呼吸
[00:07.33]ChopsquadDJ制作
[00:07.48]我无法呼吸 999
[00:13.87]等待着喘息的机会
[00:18.79]我把痛苦和愿望都扔进许愿井里
[00:25.12]我无法呼吸 我等待着喘息的机会
[00:28.62]把我的痛苦和愿望都扔进许愿井里
[00:31.38]还是不走运 但是没关系
[00:34.87]我还是会努力 即使我知道我会失败
[00:38.56]肩负着巨大的压力 就像背负着一块铁砧
[00:41.78]止痛药让我浑身奇痒 就像身上有个蚂蚁窝
[00:44.64]药物慢慢地夺走我的生命 就像Lauryn Hill唱的歌那样
[00:47.81]有时候 我不知道自己是什么感觉
[00:51.06]抑郁症不断纠缠着我
[00:54.02]你把我的过去和回忆当做武器
[00:57.36]另一方面 我又在与**抗争
[01:01.00]说起恶魔 我现在好想念那些东西
[01:04.21]这不可能是真的 这是幻想吧
[01:07.34]好像有什么东西破碎了 需要修补一下
[01:10.26]我大声呼救 有人听得见吗
[01:13.81]我会独自一人待着 直到一切都过去为止
[01:17.03]就是在这种时候 我告诉你说我很好 但我在撒谎
[01:20.58]我只是不想让你担忧
[01:23.35]就是在这种时候 我把自己所有的感情都隐藏起来
[01:27.23]因为我不想让任何人伤害我
[01:29.40]我无法呼吸 我等待着喘息的机会
[01:32.55]把我的痛苦和愿望都扔进许愿井里
[01:35.41]还是不走运 但是没关系
[01:38.89]我还是会努力 即使我知道我会失败
[01:42.50]我背负的巨大压力 就像一块铁砧
[01:45.91]止痛药让我浑身奇痒 就像身上有个蚂蚁窝
[01:48.66]药物慢慢地夺走我的生命 就像Lauryn Hill唱的歌那样
[01:51.84]有时候 我不知道自己是什么感觉
[01:54.92]有时候 我不知道自己是什么感觉
[01:58.22]让我们坦白说
[01:59.77]要不是因为有药物给我一点安慰 我就不会在这里
[02:02.90]但如果我继续服用 我恐怕就会死去
[02:07.02]我已经把我所有的秘密都告诉你了
[02:10.43]我真的感觉撕心裂肺
[02:13.62]我真的觉得我需要药物
[02:17.54]我不再服用这些东西 现在我被这些东西控制了
[02:20.97]就是在这种时候 我告诉你说我很好 但我在撒谎
[02:24.55]我只是不想让你担忧
[02:27.34]就是在这种时候 我把自己所有的感情都隐藏起来
[02:31.15]因为我不想让任何人伤害我
[02:33.45]我无法呼吸 我等待着喘息的机会
[02:36.56]把我的痛苦和愿望都扔进许愿井里
[02:39.38]还是不走运 但是没关系
[02:42.74]我还是会努力 即使我知道我会失败
[02:46.47]我背负的巨大压力 就像一块铁砧
[02:49.77]止痛药让我浑身奇痒 就像身上有个蚂蚁窝
[02:52.64]药物慢慢地夺走我的生命 就像Lauryn Hill唱的歌那样
[02:55.81]有时候 我不知道自己是什么感觉
